summary: This is an internal email chain regarding the organization of interview notes from a document management project related to the Epstein case. It involves FBI and NYPD personnel from the Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, with instructions on how to file notes by date and interviewee name.

events.title: Email Correspondence on Interview Notes Management
events.description: Internal emails discussing the organization and filing of interview notes from a document management project, with specific formatting instructions.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 15, 2019, concerning the management of interview notes from an investigation.
It involves personnel from the FBI and NYPD Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating an active investigative effort.
Instructions specify saving interview notes with a format including date and interviewee name, suggesting systematic evidence collection.
The correspondence highlights internal procedural coordination for document organization related to the case.
